text: Montgomery Bryden "Monty" Davidson (23 October 1935 - 26 March 2017) was Canadian politician. He served as a New Democratic member of the Legislative Assembly of Ontario for the riding of Cambridge from 1975 until 1981. Davidson died at his home in Cambridge, Ontario on 26 March 2017, aged 81.Montgomery "Monty" Davidson ~ 1935-2017 http://www.corbettfuneralhome.ca/obituaries/115101 ==References== ==Other websites== * Ontario Legislative Assembly Parliamentarian History Category:1935 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Politicians from Ontario
title: Monty Davidson
